item.title: White Light Robots Transform MRO Inspection
item.description: Industrial robots equipped with white light scanners automate high-precision inspection for turbine disks.

item.title: AI Defect Detection Automates Airbag Yarn Quality Control
item.description: AI-driven defect detection upgrades inspection processes for safety-critical automotive airbag components.

item.title: RobCo Raises $100M for Physical AI-Driven Robotics
item.description: RobCo secures $100M investment to expand physical AI robotics in global manufacturing.

item.title: Silicon Photonics and FMCW Transform LiDAR Technology
item.description: Integration of silicon photonics and FMCW technology makes LiDAR smaller, cheaper, and more robust for industrial sensing.

item.title: Flir Launches A6450 Cooled MWIR Cameras for Continuous Automation
item.description: Flir introduces A6450 thermal cameras designed for continuous industrial automation and non-destructive testing.

item.title: Metallo Boosts Inspection Efficiency with Automated Optical Measurement
item.description: Metallo Ltd increases inspection efficiency by 30% using Baty Velo FV automated optical measurement system.

item.title: SHINING 3D Launches Modular FreeScan Omni Series
item.description: New wireless, standalone 3D scanning platform FreeScan Omni optimized for mobile metrology workflows.
